mapper.select: SELECT project_correlation_module.project_id as project_id, project.name as project_name, module_correlation_concept.module_id as module_id, Function_module.name as module_name, module_correlation_concept.concept_id as concept_id, Basic_concept.name as concept_name FROM ((( project INNER JOIN project_correlation_module ON project.id=project_correlation_module.project_id ) INNER JOIN Function_module ON project_correlation_module.module_id=Function_module.id ) INNER JOIN module_correlation_concept ON Function_module.id=module_correlation_concept.module_id ) INNER JOIN Basic_concept ON module_correlation_concept.concept_id=Basic_concept.id WHERE (project.id=#{id}) ORDER BY Function_module.id;
SELECT id AS case_id, name FROM solution_or_case WHERE id=#{caseId};

SELECT concept.id as concept_id, concept.name, concept_module.module_id, module_case.case_id FROM (concept INNER JOIN concept_module ON concept.id=concept_module.concept_id) INNER JOIN module_case ON concept_module.module_id=module_case.module_id WHERE module_case.case_id=#{caseId}
SELECT module.name AS target FROM module INNER JOIN module_case ON module.id=module_case.module_id WHERE module_case.case_id=#{caseId};
SELECT concept.name AS target FROM concept_module INNER JOIN concept ON concept.id=concept_module.concept_id WHERE module_id=#{moduleId};
SELECT case_id FROM module_case WHERE module_id=#{moduleId};
SELECT module_id FROM concept_module WHERE concept_id=#{conceptId};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM module_case WHERE module_id=#{moduleId} AND case_id=#{caseId}
